sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'

import {
  ProductFormContainer,
  ProductFormWrapper,
  Title,
  FormWrap,
  FormContent,
  Form,
  Column1,
  Column2,
  ImgProduct,
  FormLabel,
  ButtonWrapper,
  FormInput,
  FormButton,
} from './NewProductFormElements'

const ProductForm = () => {
  return (
    <ProductFormContainer>
      <ProductFormWrapper>
        <Title>Nuevo producto</Title>
        <FormWrap>
          <FormContent>
            <Form>
              <Column1>
              <ImgUpload className="imgPreview" />
                {!imgPreview && (
                  <>
                    <ImgProduct htmlFor="imgProduct" className='customFileUpload'>Selecciona imagen</ImgProduct>
                <FormInput type='file' id='imgProduct' />>
                  </>
                )}
              
                
                {imgPreview && (
                <button onClick={() => setImgPreview(null)}>Remove image</button>
              )}
              </Column1>
              <Column2>
                <FormLabel>Nombre: 
                  <FormInput type='text' required/>
                </FormLabel>
                <FormLabel>Código: 
                  <FormInput type='text' required/>
                </FormLabel>
                <FormLabel>Precio: 
                  <FormInput type='number' required/>
                </FormLabel>
                <FormLabel>Descripción: 
                  <FormInput type='text' max={150} />
                </FormLabel>
              </Column2>
              <ButtonWrapper>
                <FormButton id='cancel' type='button'>Cancelar</FormButton>
                <FormButton type='submit'>Guardar</FormButton>
              </ButtonWrapper>
            </Form>
          </FormContent>
        </FormWrap>
      </ProductFormWrapper>
    </ProductFormContainer>
  )
}

export default ProductForm
